What are the symptoms of Russell-Silver syndrome ?,"What are the signs and symptoms of Russell-Silver syndrome? Signs and symptoms of Russell-Silver syndrome (RSS) can vary and may include: intrauterine growth restriction low birth weight poor growth short stature curving of the pinky finger (clinodactyly) characteri
